<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Potency Crystal](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2989)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=709" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 266 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32))</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You make an attack with the affixed weapon, but you haven't rolled yet

 
</row>

</column>

---

This fluorite crystal glows with a strange phosphorescence. When you activate the crystal, the weapon becomes a _[+1 striking weapon](/Equipment.aspx?ID=380)_ on the Strike and until the end of this turn, gaining a +1 item bonus to the attack roll and increasing the damage to two weapon damage dice.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
